events.text: You finally arrived, we were waiting for you
If you are here that means that you wanted to explore some new cool places.
Maybe get some inspiration for your work
Since you decided to come yourself you can leave at any time!
but pay attention because this is really important. To leave you need to follow these steps . . .
Close your eyes as hard as you can, and when you feel they are completely closed, open them as fast as you can, that should wake you up.

Press SPACEBAR and hold it until you cant see anything, then press ENTER.
Do this ONLY when you want to exit the dream. Dreams cant be re entered in this version.

Welp, i hope you enjoy your time here, and remember, you are not alone on these dreams so interact with as many people as you want, and share your experiences with everyone, -some say that the DreamLand grows the more people think about it-
